title: Merciless
description: Rule #1: An Assassin is cruel, cold, and ruthless.Rule #2: An Assassin is never, under any circumstance, an elf.Until Mercy.Seventeen years after being given to the ruthless Assassins’ Guild, Mercy will do anything to prove her worth to the headmistress of the Guild . . . but her cruel tutors and fellow apprentices will stop at nothing to keep from being bested by an elf.Her mission?Kill the prince.The mad king’s court is a web of deadly secrets, blackmail, and strange supernatural occurrences. If she can find a way to assassinate the prince before the cutthroat courtiers discover her true identity, she’ll earn her place as the greatest Assassin the Guild has ever trained.If not, it’ll be more than her pride on the chopping block.
author: Jacqueline Pawl
